solution_line_template: Lisa drinks {caffeine_per_cup}*{num_cups}=<<{caffeine_per_cup}*{num_cups}={total_caffeine_drank}>>{total_caffeine_drank} mg of caffeine in {num_cups} cups of coffee.
She wanted to have {caffeine_goal}, so she is {over_goal} mg over her goal because {total_caffeine_drank}-{caffeine_goal} = <<{total_caffeine_drank}-{caffeine_goal}={over_goal}>>{over_goal}mg.
